subject: Re: [Fwd: Re: [junit] Propagating Exceptions]
msgSnippet: ... But reported as Errors rather than Failures. Hence, my use of fail. Regards, Rob __________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Get
messageBody:
--- Steve Freeman <steve@...> wrote:
> Any other exceptions will be caught and reported by junit.

But reported as Errors rather than Failures. Hence, my use of fail.

Regards,

Rob
